subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Joe Girardi became the sixth skipper to manage 1,000 games for the Yankees in Friday’s 14-inning loss to Tampa Bay, a contest that included a wild double play in the 12th and Derek Jeter’s first 0-for-7 game.
snippet: Joe Girardi became the sixth skipper to manage 1,000 games for the Yankees in Friday’s 14-inning loss to Tampa Bay, a contest that included a wild double play in the 12th and Derek Jeter’s first 0-for-7 game.
